file-upload.title: Upload CSV
file-upload.subtitle: Upload the file you want to import
file-upload.data-type-description: Select the type of data you would like to import

drag-and-drop.placeholder: Drag and drop your file here

upload-result.max-size-error: The maximum file size is {{ fileMaxSize }}. Your file size is too large. Try uploading another one.
upload-result.file-type-error: The file you are trying to upload has an invalid format. Please upload a CSV file.

import-preview.title: Preview
import-preview.subtitle: Preview the CSV file you are going to upload
import-preview.preview-legend: Please use horizontal scrolling to see all columns in the import preview

csv-file-delete.title: Delete CSV
csv-file-delete.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete this CSV file?

csv-file-delete-and-close-preview.title: Delete CSV
csv-file-delete-and-close-preview.subtitle: Are you sure you want to close preview and delete this file?

EditorialReview-export.title: Export descriptions
EditorialReview-export.subtitle-end: will be exported to a CSV file.

PhysicalProduct-export.title: Export products
PhysicalProduct-export.subtitle-end: will be exported to a CSV file.

limits-warning.main-text-middle: while you cannot export more than
limits-warning.main-text-end: please select a valid number of items and try again.

validation-errors.exceeding-file-max-size: The maximum file size is {{ fileMaxSize }}. Your file size is too large. Try uploading another one.
validation-errors.wrong-delimiter: Invalid delimiter. Please use only semicolon (;) as a delimiter.
validation-errors.exceeding-line-limits: We are unable to import your file, as the maximum number of lines to import is {{ importLimitOfLines }}. Your file currently has {{ linesCount }} lines.
validation-errors.missing-required-columns: We are unable to import your file, as the following required columns: \"{{ missedColumns }}\" are missing in it.
